revision.text:
<!--공직자_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = OfficeHolder
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원래 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생지 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = nationality }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 정당 | ontologyProperty = party }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 배우자 | ontologyProperty = spouse }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 자녀 | ontologyProperty = child }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종교 | ontologyProperty = religion }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping 
          | templateProperty = 임기 
          | startDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsStartDate 
          | endDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsEndDate
        }}
end}}



<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 직책      = 
| 전임      = 
| 후임      = 
| 대통령    = 
| 총리      = 
| 학력      = 
-->
